short_summary: Contract for replacing HVAC valves at a lab in Charlottetown, PEI
description: Replacement of the air valve in the CFIA building HVAC system
full_summary:
======================================

**Tender Announcement: HVAC Valve Replacement (ITT)**
--------------------------------------------------------

**Location:** CFIA Laboratory, Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

**Submission Deadline:** 14:00:00 (local time) on September 11, 2023

**Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Procurement Category:** Minor Construction (CNST)
--------------------------------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the HVAC valve replacement project at the CFIA laboratory in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island.

**Scope of Work:**

The project involves the replacement of air valves in the HVAC system at the CFIA building. This opportunity is restricted to contractors who have been pre-qualified through a recent tendering process.

**Key Requirements:**

* The contractor must have a valid Canadian Goods and Services Tax (GST) number.
* The contractor must be eligible to participate in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The contractor must have experience in HVAC maintenance and construction.

**Submission Instructions:**

Prospective bidders must submit their bid electronically through the contractizing government's procurement portal.

The bid must include:

* A completed bid form
* A detailed description of the method and approach for the valve replacement
* A comprehensive timeline for the project
* A breakdown of costs and expenses
* Evidence of the contractor's qualification and experience

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The PSPC will evaluate bids based on price, technical merit, and experience. The lowest bidder will be awarded the contract.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, contact Richard Parsons, PSPC procurement officer, at [richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). + none.

**Note:**

* This tender announcement is subject to change without notice.
* All bidders must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the procurement documents. + none.
